attributes.action: Discipline for those convicted of the 2011 Riots
attributes.additional_details: For those convicted of rioting who're still in full time education I suggest they are sentenced to a series of Saturday Military style activities to enforce the ideals of discipline, teamwork and physical activities. During these Saturday sessions, the youths convicted should be taught Citizenship and Community responsibility reinforced through local projects to rebuild affected areas. Contributing overall to the Big Society.
